author: Second Wind
description:
This video is brought to you by The Deadly Path, the unique fast-paced building management and roguelike RTS. – https://store.steampowered.com/app/2455350/The_Deadly_Path/

This week on Firelink, Nick, KC, and Marty dive deep into the big Nintendo Switch 2 Direct.

If you dig the podcast, considering supporting us over at Patreon --  https://www.patreon.com/SecondWindGroup

Check out our excellent selection of merch over at our DFTBA store -- https://store.dftba.com/collections/second-wind

Snag yourself an Adventure is Nigh! plushie over at Shark Robot -- https://sharkrobot.com/collections/second-wind
title: Nintendo Switch 2: The Good, the Bad, and the Pricey | Firelink Podcast

author: Second Wind
description:
This video is brought to you by Guards II: Chaos in Hell, the upcoming turn-based tactics game with extremely simple rules, but even more extremely deep mechanics. – https://store.steampowered.com/app/2958570/Guards_II_Chaos_in_Hell/

Yahtzee doesn't watch movies, and they should mind their manners when it comes to adapting video games into movies.

Support us on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/SecondWindGroup

title: Video Game Adaptations Need to Mind Their Manners | Semi-Ramblomatic

author: Second Wind
description:

title: Traversing the Umbral in The Lords of the Fallen w/ Jack and Jess - Part 5
